QuestData.Title: Red Snapper - Very Tasty!
QuestData.Description: I've found that these waters are bustling with red snapper, a very tasty fish. With a fishing net, I can catch enough to feed dozens of draenei! Unfortunately, I was recently attacked by a creature known as a murloc while netting in the river and have suffered some injuries that prevent me from doing my job. I need help!$B$BUse this fishing net near schools of red snapper, found in the Crystalbrook river to the east, to catch the fish.$B$BWhat do you say? Remember to return the net when you are finished.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Draenei Fishing Net to catch 10 Red Snappers. Return both the fish and the net to Diktynna on Azuremyst Isle when the task is complete.
QuestData.CompletionText: Watch out for murlocs: Strange and extremely annoying little creatures.
QuestData.RewardText: I hope the murlocs didn't cause too much trouble, $n. I owe you a great debt of gratitude for all that you've done.$B$BPerhaps I could teach you how to fish? I'll even supply the fishing pole and a bauble.
